content.question: Which of the following was a major similarity among European colonial empires in the Americas in the period 1450-1750 ?

choices.label: Encouragement of the development of industrial manufacturing in their territories
Enslavement of African peoples and subjugation of Amerindians
Settlement of millions of Europeans in each of their colonial territories

content.answer: Enslavement of African peoples and subjugation of Amerindians

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
